fields.sql:
SELECT 
	patients_patient.id AS "Patient ID", 
    given_names AS "Given Names", 
    family_name AS "Family Name", 
    TO_CHAR(date_of_birth, 'DD-MM-YYYY') AS "DOB",
    dmd_diagnosis.diagnosis AS "Registry Type",
    groups_workinggroup.name AS "Jurisdiction"
FROM patients_patient
	INNER JOIN groups_workinggroup 
    	on patients_patient.working_group_id = groups_workinggroup.id
    INNER JOIN dmd_diagnosis
    	on patients_patient.id = dmd_diagnosis.id
fields.title: Patient Report

fields.sql:
SELECT DISTINCT
	patients_patient.id AS "Patient ID", 
    COALESCE(NULLIF(genetic_gene.name, ''), 'Unknown') AS "Gene",
    COALESCE(NULLIF(genetic_variation.exon, ''), 'Unknown') AS "Exon",
    COALESCE(NULLIF(genetic_variation.dna_variation, ''), 'Unknown') AS "DNA Variation",
    CASE 
    	WHEN genetic_variation.deletion_all_exons_tested IS True THEN 'Yes' 
        WHEN genetic_variation.deletion_all_exons_tested IS False THEN 'No'
        ELSE 'Unknown' 
    END AS "All Exons Tested (Deletion)",
    CASE 
    	WHEN genetic_variation.duplication_all_exons_tested IS True THEN 'Yes' 
        WHEN genetic_variation.duplication_all_exons_tested IS False THEN 'No'
        ELSE 'Unknown' 
    END AS "All Exons Tested (Duplications)",
    CASE 
    	WHEN genetic_variation.exon_boundaries_known IS True THEN 'Yes' 
        WHEN genetic_variation.exon_boundaries_known IS False THEN 'No'
        ELSE 'Unknown' 
    END AS "Exon Boundaries Known",
    CASE 
    	WHEN genetic_variation.point_mutation_all_exons_sequenced IS True THEN 'Yes' 
        WHEN genetic_variation.point_mutation_all_exons_sequenced IS False THEN 'No'
        ELSE 'Unknown' 
    END AS "All Exons Sequenced (Point Mutation)",
    CASE 
    	WHEN genetic_variation.all_exons_in_male_relative IS True THEN 'Yes' 
        WHEN genetic_variation.all_exons_in_male_relative IS False THEN 'No'
        ELSE 'Unknown' 
    END AS "All expons tested in Male Relative",
    dmd_diagnosis.diagnosis AS "Diagnosis", 
    CASE 
    	WHEN dmd_motorfunction.walk IS True THEN 'Yes' 
        WHEN dmd_motorfunction.walk IS False THEN 'No'
        ELSE 'Unknown' 
    END AS "Currently Able To Walk",
    COALESCE(NULLIF(dmd_motorfunction.wheelchair_use, ''), 'Unknown') AS "Wheelchair Use",
    CASE 
    	WHEN dmd_steroids.current IS True THEN 'Yes' 
        WHEN dmd_steroids.current IS False THEN 'No'
        ELSE 'Unknown' 
    END AS "Current Steroid Theraphy",
    CASE 
    	WHEN dmd_surgery.surgery IS True THEN 'Yes' 
        WHEN dmd_surgery.surgery IS False THEN 'No'
        ELSE 'Unknown' 
    END AS "Scoliosis Surgery",
    CASE 
    	WHEN dmd_heart.current IS True THEN 'Yes' 
        WHEN dmd_heart.current IS False THEN 'No'
        ELSE 'Unknown' 
    END AS "Current cardiac medication",
    CASE
        WHEN dmd_clinicaltrials.id IS NULL THEN 'No'
        ELSE 'Yes'
    END AS "Clinical Trials",
    TO_CHAR(patients_patient.date_of_birth, 'DD-MM-YYYY') AS "Date of birth",
    TO_CHAR(dmd_diagnosis.updated, 'DD-MM-YYYY') AS "Last updated",
    patients_patient.postcode AS "State/Province, postcode",
    CASE 
    	WHEN dmd_motorfunction.sit IS True THEN 'Yes' 
        WHEN dmd_motorfunction.sit IS False THEN 'No'
        ELSE 'Unknown' 
    END AS "Currently able to sit without support",
    CASE 
    	WHEN dmd_heart.failure IS True THEN 'Yes' 
        WHEN dmd_heart.failure IS False THEN 'No'
        ELSE 'Unknown' 
    END AS "Heart failure/cardiomyopathy",
    dmd_heart.lvef AS "LVEF score",
    dmd_heart.lvef_date AS "LVEF date",
    COALESCE(NULLIF(dmd_respiratory.non_invasive_ventilation, ''), 'Unknown') AS "Non Invasive Ventilation",
    COALESCE(NULLIF(dmd_respiratory.invasive_ventilation, ''), 'Unknown') AS "Invasive Ventilation",
    dmd_respiratory.fvc AS "FVC score",
    dmd_respiratory.fvc_date AS "FVC date",
    CASE 
    	WHEN dmd_diagnosis.muscle_biopsy IS True THEN 'Yes' 
        WHEN dmd_diagnosis.muscle_biopsy IS False THEN 'No'
        ELSE 'Unknown' 
    END AS "Previous Muscle Biopsy",
	CASE
        WHEN dmd_otherregistries.id IS NULL THEN 'No'
        ELSE 'Yes'
    END AS "Other Registries",
	CASE
        WHEN dmd_familymember.id IS NULL THEN 'No'
        ELSE 'Yes'
    END AS "Family History"    
FROM dmd_diagnosis
	INNER JOIN patients_patient ON dmd_diagnosis.patient_id = patients_patient.id
    INNER JOIN groups_workinggroup ON groups_workinggroup.id = patients_patient.working_group_id
    FULL JOIN genetic_moleculardata ON genetic_moleculardata.patient_id = patients_patient.id
    FULL JOIN genetic_variation ON genetic_variation.molecular_data_id = genetic_moleculardata.patient_id
    FULL JOIN genetic_gene ON genetic_gene.id = genetic_variation.gene_id
    FULL JOIN dmd_motorfunction ON dmd_diagnosis.id = dmd_motorfunction.diagnosis_id
    FULL JOIN dmd_steroids ON dmd_diagnosis.id = dmd_steroids.diagnosis_id
    FULL JOIN dmd_surgery ON dmd_diagnosis.id = dmd_surgery.diagnosis_id
    FULL JOIN dmd_heart ON dmd_diagnosis.id = dmd_heart.diagnosis_id
    FULL JOIN dmd_clinicaltrials ON dmd_diagnosis.id = dmd_clinicaltrials.diagnosis_id
    FULL JOIN dmd_respiratory ON dmd_diagnosis.id = dmd_respiratory.diagnosis_id
    FULL JOIN dmd_otherregistries ON dmd_diagnosis.id = dmd_otherregistries.diagnosis_id
    FULL JOIN dmd_familymember ON dmd_diagnosis.id = dmd_familymember.diagnosis_id
WHERE groups_workinggroup.name = '$$jurisdiction$$'
fields.title: NMD Report

fields.sql:
SELECT 
	genetic_variation.protein_variation AS "Protein Variation",
    genetic_gene.name AS "Gene",
    genetic_variation.exon AS "Exon",
    genetic_variation.dna_variation AS "DNA Variation",
    NULL AS "DNA Variation - Mutation type",
    CASE 
    	WHEN genetic_variation.deletion_all_exons_tested IS True THEN 'Yes' 
        WHEN genetic_variation.deletion_all_exons_tested IS False THEN 'No'
        ELSE 'Unknown' 
    END AS "All Exons Tested (Deletion)",
    CASE 
    	WHEN genetic_variation.duplication_all_exons_tested IS True THEN 'Yes' 
        WHEN genetic_variation.duplication_all_exons_tested IS False THEN 'No'
        ELSE 'Unknown' 
    END AS "All Exons Tested (Duplications)",
    CASE 
    	WHEN dmd_motorfunction.walk IS True THEN 'Yes' 
        WHEN dmd_motorfunction.walk IS False THEN 'No'
        ELSE 'Unknown' 
    END AS "Currently able to walk",
    CASE 
    	WHEN dmd_steroids.current IS True THEN 'Yes' 
        WHEN dmd_steroids.current IS False THEN 'No'
        ELSE 'Unknown' 
    END AS "Current steroids use",
    COALESCE(NULLIF(dmd_respiratory.non_invasive_ventilation, ''), 'Unknown') AS "Non Invasive Ventilation",
    COALESCE(NULLIF(dmd_respiratory.invasive_ventilation, ''), 'Unknown') AS "Invasive Ventilation",
    CASE
        WHEN dmd_clinicaltrials.id IS NULL THEN 'No'
        ELSE 'Yes'
    END AS "Clinical Trials",
	groups_workinggroup.name AS "Jurisdiction"
FROM genetic_variation
	INNER JOIN genetic_moleculardata ON genetic_variation.molecular_data_id = genetic_moleculardata.patient_id
    INNER JOIN genetic_gene ON genetic_gene.id = genetic_variation.gene_id
    INNER JOIN patients_patient ON patients_patient.id = genetic_moleculardata.patient_id
    INNER JOIN groups_workinggroup ON groups_workinggroup.id = patients_patient.working_group_id
    INNER JOIN dmd_diagnosis ON patients_patient.id = dmd_diagnosis.patient_id
    LEFT JOIN dmd_motorfunction ON dmd_motorfunction.diagnosis_id = dmd_diagnosis.id
    LEFT JOIN dmd_steroids ON dmd_steroids.diagnosis_id = dmd_diagnosis.id
    LEFT JOIN dmd_respiratory ON dmd_respiratory.diagnosis_id = dmd_diagnosis.id
    LEFT JOIN dmd_clinicaltrials ON dmd_clinicaltrials.diagnosis_id = dmd_diagnosis.id
fields.title: Genetic Report
